effect.Name: Division With Power (Background)
effect.description: Base and blend colors are divided after which the colors are reduced by the power function.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Division With Power (Background) Shader | 1.2 (28.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Base and blend colors are divided after which the colors are reduced by the power function.

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable manages which color will be the divider. When this value is set to 0 then blend will divide base and when set to 1 then base will divide blend.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Power
parameter.description: This variable determines the exponent to which the sum of base and blend is raised as a function of power.
